items.preText: Mahabub Miraj: "Soumya and Imrul makes the competition even harder for the opening slot. 1 position, 3 candidates except the permanent one - Tamim. Selectors should be in a sweet dilemma to select one or two among them. Happy as a B'Deshi supporter."

items.text: appeal for lbw, not given by Dharmasena. Zimbabwe contemplate a review and they take it. This might be worth it as it looked close. On a length, straightens past the outside edge and raps the pad. No edge. Clipping top of off, so umpire's call remains
